page.title: 15Leisure Activities in Otley
page.content: Many people in Otley like participating in sports some of these sports are Football,cricket,rugby,golf,swimming, tennis,cycling,athletics and many more. Other people enjoy less energetic sports like Walking,fishing,gardening and reading. Many people enjoy collecting things like stamps or coins.Other people like bird or train spotting. Also many people enjoy going to clubs which have activities like Bingo or Dances. Some younger people may prefer to join the Beavers,Cubs,Scouts,Brownies or Guides.If you don't enjoy any of these you could go on a trip to the country or somewhere else pleasant. There are many comics which children like to read in their leisure time.
